DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 : QUARTERFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; WORLD CUP 2 , G-7
DOC.TEXT: There ' s a G-7 economic summit in Naples , but it comes_in a distant second to the World Cup in importance . And not only for Italians . An aide whispered to Italian Premier Silvio Berlusconi that Dino Baggio had scored to give Italy a 1-0 lead over Spain as Berlusconi was rushing from a news_conference Saturday . After answering questions for 45 minutes , Berlusconi met with Russian President Boris Yeltsin with the hope of rushing back for the second_half . French President Francois Mitterrand was trying to cut another news_conference short , and when reporters persisted , he finally said to one , " You are no sportswoman. "
